jobTitle: Senior Data Scientist Dynamics 365 Customer Analytics & Growth Hacking
jobDescription: Do you want to be part of a team that is passionate about transforming data into insights and action? Are you interested in working across engineering, marketing & sales teams to drive user satisfaction, usage & revenue? Would you want the opportunity to impact millions of people and millions of revenue while working in one of the most ‘data rich' products, having unlimited access to BI & AI technology and compute capacity? If yes, please read on!  The Microsoft Cloud and Enterprise, Business Applications Group is looking for a top-notch, experienced, hands-on data scientist with large SaaS service data skills and an analytics determination. Someone who is driven, self-directed, and focused on delivering the right results through data. The candidate should be able to apply a breadth of tools, data sources and analytical techniques that can help us answer a wide range of questions and power operational triggers with a measurable impact within the Dynamics 365 business.  Our team was established to provide state-of-the-art customer, partner & user analytics to drive product decisions, usage and revenues. Success hinges on enabling everyone in the organization to make informed decisions and in application of data science to automate actions that drive usage & revenue growth including personalized recommendations, marketing automation & lead scoring. We have a lot of success with products like Power BI and now are expanding our charter to Dynamics 365.Responsibilities
